name: two point sling
description: A shoulder strap allows the rifle to be worn over your shoulders like a piece of clothing.  However, it offers no protection.

name: single point sling
description: A single point sling allows a longarm to be worn suspended from a strap. It is very quick to draw and even quicker to stow, but very encumbering.  It offers no protection.

name: three point sling
description: A three point sling allows a longarm to be worn in a precise location.  It's not very encumbering at all, but requires additional time to stow over a traditional sling.  It offers no protection.
